TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pungudan, title = Pungudan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pungudan} }

S.FORM: Pungudan Itiniay i Mudan Cen no Pingtung ko Pungudan a niyaro', 130 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 359 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 90% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 323 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 10% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 36 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan86%, Amis1%, Bunun1%, Rukai1%, roma1%.

Pongodan Itiniay i Modan Cen no Pingtong ko Pongodan a niyaro', 130 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 359 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 90% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 323 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 10% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 36 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan86%, Amis1%, Bonon1%, Rokai1%, roma1%.
